basics.name: Lyor (Leo) Itzhaki
basics.headline: Senior Product Manager | Consumer Mobile Apps & IoT

summary.name: Professional Summary
summary.content: Customer-obsessed product leader with 5+ years of experience shipping high-quality consumer mobile apps and features for 30M+ users. Proven ability to translate complex data from regulated environments (fintech, trust & safety) into simple, valuable, and delightful user experiences. Drove a 33% CVR lift at TrueML, a 30-point NPS jump at EcoCart, and now lead policy and safety for eBay's live commerce platform.

items.position: Senior Product Manager, Live Trust & Safety (Contract)
items.summary:
Lead Trust & Safety for eBay’s live-commerce platform, owning policy enforcement, user safety, and regulatory compliance features.

  • Own end-to-end strategy and delivery for four critical initiatives including chat moderation, unpaid-item fraud, DSAR compliance, and buyer/seller protections.

  • Define and track key safety metrics (harmful-content rate, moderation latency) by partnering with Data Science to build dashboards, protecting $19.5B in quarterly GMV.

  • Led development of seller-moderation controls to give hosts power over chat and buyer access, fast-tracked for upcoming eBay Live Tour events to ensure a safe user experience.

  • Accelerated roadmap delivery by removing ~30% of critical cross-functional blockers in the first month and cutting approval cycle time from 3 weeks to 10 days.

Owned the core payment product for a consumer fintech platform. Used A/B testing, user insights, and data analysis to increase conversion and ensure compliance.

  • Drove $3-5M in annualized revenue uplift by scaling A/B testing to 30+ experiments per quarter, lifting checkout CVR by 33% and payment completions by 19%.

  • Led a mobile-first redesign of the core repayment flow, improving the mobile app experience by simplifying UX and reducing average checkout time by 15 seconds.

  • Turned complex behavioral data into valuable features by partnering with Data Science to refine ML-driven user segmentation, boosting plan selection rates by 12%.

Drove new product strategy at a post-purchase e-commerce startup, focusing on deep customer engagement to define and validate new features.

  • Established package protection as the next revenue pillar by deeply understanding the voice of the customer through 10+ merchant interviews and data analysis.

  • Launched a Shopify pilot that secured 24% adoption in its first month and lifted average merchant NPS from 35 to 65, demonstrating a high bar for user experience.

  • Prototyped an LLM-driven claims triage system, demonstrating a potential 40% reduction in manual review for early CS workflow testing.

Built the product operations and support organization from scratch at a pre-PM fintech startup, establishing the 'voice of the customer' function.

  • Established customer support SLAs and built Looker dashboards, cutting first response time from over 24 hours to under 4 hours while maintaining a 4.6/5 CSAT.

  • Conducted user research and analysis of support tickets to inform product strategy, contributing to a 25% increase in Monthly Active Users (MAU).

Founded a micro-agency that ships AI-powered MVPs end to end for non-technical founders, turning complex ideas into scalable products.

  • Validated market demand and user needs via 25+ founder discovery interviews, informing a rapid delivery playbook that cuts build time from weeks to days.

Partnered directly with founders to lead 0 to 1 product discovery, scoping, and delivery from concept to launch.

  • ProgForce: Rapid-prototyped a gamified forecasting UX, boosting participation from 40% to 70% in user testing.

  • AssemblyDrop: Defined a marketplace MVP and successfully piloted the platform with 5 initial crews.

items.name: DebtCat (Founder/Builder)
items.description: Independently built and launched an AI-powered consumer platform that turns complex legal and financial data into simple, actionable steps for users. Features include an educational chatbot and automated document generation (Next.js, OpenAI API, Stripe).

items.name: FindMe.pet (Founder/Builder)
items.description: Launched an AI platform that translates complex compatibility data into simple, delightful pet adoption matches, designed to reduce shelter return rates by focusing on deep user empathy and lifestyle analysis (Next.js, Petfinder API, OpenAI API).

css.value: @media print { body { font-size: 10px !important; line-height: 1.2 !important; margin: 0 !important; padding: 0 !important; } .header { margin-top: 0 !important; padding-top: 0 !important; } .section { margin-bottom: 6px !important; padding: 0 !important; } .experience-item, .project-item { margin-bottom: 4px !important; } ul { margin: 2px 0 !important; padding-left: 16px !important; } li { margin-bottom: 1px !important; } .skills-section { margin-bottom: 2px !important; } h1, h2, h3 { margin: 0 0 4px 0 !important; } } body { font-size: 11px !important; line-height: 1.3 !important; } .section { margin-bottom: 8px !important; } .experience-item, .project-item { margin-bottom: 6px !important; } ul { margin: 4px 0 !important; } li { margin-bottom: 2px !important; } .skills-section { margin-bottom: 4px !important; }
